name: kaggle_search_datasets
description: Search Kaggle datasets specifically. Uses the datasets browse page with search filter. Returns dataset titles, URLs, and descriptions.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for Kaggle datasets (e.g. 'titanic', 'housing prices', 'NLP')

steps.code: const results = []; const seen = new Set(); document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/datasets/"]').forEach(a => { const href = a.getAttribute('href'); if (!href || !href.match(/\/datasets\/[^/]+\/[^/]+/) || seen.has(href)) return; seen.add(href); const title = a.textContent.trim(); if (!title || title.length > 200 || title.length < 3) return; const parent = a.closest('li') || a.parentElement; const desc = parent ? Array.from(parent.querySelectorAll('span,p')).map(e => e.textContent.trim()).filter(t => t.length > 20 && t !== title).slice(0, 1).join('') : ''; results.push({ title: title.substring(0, 200), url: 'https://www.kaggle.com' + href, description: desc.substring(0, 300) }); }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results: results.slice(0, 15) };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract dataset results
